text: The 9th season of the Syfy reality television series Face Off premiered on July 28, 2015. The season's third episode, "Surprise of the Century", is the series' 100th episode. The grand prize for the ninth season is a VIP trip from Kryolan to one of their 85 locations, a 2015 Fiat 500, and $100,000. Nora Hewitt of Barkhamsted, Connecticut was declared the winner on October 27, 2015. ==Contestants== {| class="wikitable |- ! Name ! Age ! Hometown !
